10  
11  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.eclipse.mechanic;
12  
13  import java.io.File;
14  import java.io.FileWriter;
15  import java.util.Map;
16  
17  import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
18  import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
19  import org.junit.Assert;
20  import org.junit.Rule;
21  import org.junit.Test;
22  import org.junit.rules.TemporaryFolder;
23  
24  public class WorkspaceMechanicConfigParserTest {
25  	private static final String PREFIX = "/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/";
26  
27  	@Rule
28  	public TemporaryFolder EPF_FOLDER = new TemporaryFolder();
29  
30  	/**
31  	 * Contains the actual epf files.
32  	 */
33  	@Rule
34  	public TemporaryFolder EPF_PROXY_FOLDER = new TemporaryFolder();
35  
36  	@Test
37  	public void testSimpleEpfFileFiltered() throws Exception {
38  		File epfImportFile = EPF_FOLDER.newFile("imports.epf");
39  		try (FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(epfImportFile)) {
40  			fw.write("""
41  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/importorder=java;javax;org;com;
42  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/ondemandthreshold=99
43  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/staticondemandthreshold=2
44  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.ui/staticondemandthreshold=7""");
45  		}
46  
47  		Map<String, String> props = WorkspaceMechanicConfigParser.readPropertiesFromConfiguration(epfImportFile.getAbsolutePath(), PREFIX);
48  
49  		Assert.assertEquals(3, props.size());
50  		Assert.assertEquals("2", props.get("staticondemandthreshold"));
51  		Assert.assertEquals("99", props.get("ondemandthreshold"));
52  		Assert.assertEquals("java;javax;org;com;", props.get("importorder"));
53  	}
54  
55  	@Test
56  	public void testSimpleEpfFileUnfiltered() throws Exception {
57  		File epfImportFile = EPF_FOLDER.newFile("imports.epf");
58  		try (FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(epfImportFile)) {
59  			fw.write("""
60  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/importorder=java;javax;org;com;
61  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/ondemandthreshold=99
62  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/staticondemandthreshold=2
63  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.ui/adifferentpref=7""");
64  		}
65  
66  		Map<String, String> props = WorkspaceMechanicConfigParser.readPropertiesFromConfiguration(epfImportFile.getAbsolutePath(), null);
67  
68  		Assert.assertEquals(4, props.size());
69  		Assert.assertEquals("2", props.get("/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/staticondemandthreshold"));
70  		Assert.assertEquals("99", props.get("/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/ondemandthreshold"));
71  		Assert.assertEquals("java;javax;org;com;", props.get("/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/importorder"));
72  		Assert.assertEquals("7", props.get("/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.ui/adifferentpref"));
73  	}
74  
75  	@Test
76  	public void testProxyEpfFile() throws Exception {
77  		String epfProxyFolderPath = EPF_PROXY_FOLDER.getRoot().getAbsolutePath();
78  		if (SystemUtils.IS_OS_WINDOWS) {
79  			epfProxyFolderPath = StringUtils.replace(epfProxyFolderPath, "\\", "\\\\");
80  		}
81  
82  		File epfFile = EPF_FOLDER.newFile();
83  		try (FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(epfFile)) {
84  			fw.write(
85  					"/instance/com.google.eclipse.mechanic/mechanicSourceDirectories=[\"" + epfProxyFolderPath + "\",\"/a/user/path/.eclipse/mechanic\"]");
86  		}
87  
88  		File epfImportFile = EPF_PROXY_FOLDER.newFile("imports.epf");
89  		try (FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(epfImportFile)) {
90  			fw.write("""
91  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/importorder=java;javax;org;com;
92  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/ondemandthreshold=99
93  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/staticondemandthreshold=2""");
94  		}
95  
96  		File epfSaveActionsFile = EPF_PROXY_FOLDER.newFile("onsave.epf");
97  		try (FileWriter fw = new FileWriter(epfSaveActionsFile)) {
98  			fw.write("""
99  					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/sp_cleanup.format_source_code=true
100 					/instance/org.eclipse.jdt.core/sp_cleanup.on_save_use_additional_actions=true""");
101 		}
102 
103 		Map<String, String> props = WorkspaceMechanicConfigParser.readPropertiesFromConfiguration(epfFile.getAbsolutePath(), PREFIX);
104 
105 		Assert.assertEquals(5, props.size());
106 		Assert.assertEquals("2", props.get("staticondemandthreshold"));
107 		Assert.assertEquals("99", props.get("ondemandthreshold"));
108 		Assert.assertEquals("java;javax;org;com;", props.get("importorder"));
109 		Assert.assertEquals("true", props.get("sp_cleanup.format_source_code"));
110 		Assert.assertEquals("true", props.get("sp_cleanup.on_save_use_additional_actions"));
111 	}
112 }
